results.raw_content:
# Where Event Organizers Grow

The all-in-one ticketing and discovery platform trusted by millions of organizers and attendees worldwide

## Event hosting made easy

**Event Ticketing**

Sell more tickets with customizable event pages and a seamless checkout experience for attendees on a trusted platform

**Reporting & Analytics**

Learn more about your buyers and discover where sales are coming from with real-time analytics

**Organizer App**

Check guests in, sell tickets at the door, and track data with our easy-to-use Eventbrite Organizer App

## Reach the right people

Grow your community on a marketplace where millions of people look for things to do.

**Attendee Discovery**

Personalized recommendations are tailored to attendees' interests and location, matching them with events they’d be most interested in attending

**Eventbrite Ads**

Promote your event across Eventbrite and get 14x more visibility on our homepage, related events, search results, and more

**Marketing Tools**

Engage attendees and reach new ones with our suite of automated email and social marketing tools

## All the tools you need to host an event & grow your community

[Event Ticketing](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/features/sell-tickets/)

Everything you need to sell tickets for in-person or online events

[Eventbrite Ads](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/features/eventbrite-ads/)

Create no-hassle ads that promote your event on Eventbrite

[Marketing Tools](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/features/event-marketing-platform/)

All the event marketing tools you need in one place

[Payments](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/features/event-payment/)

Easily collect and simplify event payments

## Get paid, earn more

Do what you love and earn more money with low-cost fees and quicker payouts

**Low-cost fees**

Clear value, transparent fees. So you can focus on the important things.

**Payment Processing**

Easily collect and simplify event payments with built-in, full-service payment processing

**Scheduled Payouts**

Get paid before your event takes place on a customized schedule of your choice

EXPLORE OUR SOLUTIONS

* [Music Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-type/music-venues/)
* [Corporate Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-type/eventbrite-for-business/)

* [Food & Beverage Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-industry/food-drink-event-ticketing/)
* [Performing Arts Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-industry/performing-arts/)
* [Classes & Workshops Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-type/create-a-workshop/)
* [Retail Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-format/host-retail-events/)
* [Nonprofit Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-type/npo/)
* [Festivals & Fairs Events](https://www.eventbrite.com/organizer/event-type/festival-solutions/)

## Grow your events business

It’s a really easy platform to get communications out. I can send an email the day before an event and people open it. We sell out.Salt Lake Power Yoga

If you’re using Eventbrite ticketing, Eventbrite Ads is an obvious place for those advertising dollars to go.The Riot Comedy Club

Ultimately what I need is for people to land on the event page. The more views I have, the more likely I am to sell out.Drunk Theatre

## Creator Spotlight

Discover how DJ Prashant makes music, community, and connection on the dance floor

EVENTBRITE ALL ACCESS

Well, you’re in luck! At Eventbrite we love to help […]

Not feeling creative? Here’s a laundry list of event theme ideas to adopt or alter for your next event.

As an event organizer, your Eventbrite listing page needs to stand out ✨. First impressions count, and your event page is often the first thing potential event-goers see. And there are a lot of potential event-goers on Eventbrite. Last year, more than 200 million people searched for things to do on Eventbrite, with more than 90 million of those buying tickets to […]

## Publish your events for free

Reach more people on the world's largest and most trusted events marketplace. Everything you need to host standout events and earn more.

---

---

### The all-in-one toolkit to grow your events

* Flexible ticket types for in-person or online events
* Integrated email and social media marketing tools
* Secure and seamless attendee checkout
* Payouts before your event
* Detailed analytics and reporting

---

---

### Low fees for your attendees

* No fees for free events
* 3.7% + $1.79 service fee per ticket
* 2.9% payment processing fee per order
* Ticketing Fees are paid by ticket buyers on paid tickets unless you choose to cover them

[Find out more about how fees work](/help/en-us/articles/755615/)

## Hosting a large or complex event?

We offer tailored plans for event pros with unique needs. Get personalized support, customized pricing, and more by partnering with our sales team.

## The best support and resources for event organizers in the industry

#### Eventbrite Academy

Learn the ins & outs of event promotion and management to help you take your events to the next level

#### Eventbrite Help Center

Easily access answers, tutorials, guides, and FAQs in Eventbrite's Help Center to effectively navigate and use the platform

## Grow eventfully

Explore all the built-in tools you need to start, run, and grow your business with events.
